## Quick start

### Install

Stable version from CRAN

```{r eval=FALSE}
install.packages("recordlinkR")
```

Or dev version from GitHub.

```{r eval=FALSE}
devtools::install_github("kailin-lu/recordlinkR")
```

```{r}
library("recordlinkR")
```
